definition: John Leighton Stuart (1876-1962), second-generation American missionary in China, first president of Yenching University and later United States ambassador to China

sentences.english: John Leighton Stuart was the US Ambassador to China during the Second Civil War between the KMT and the CPC.
sentences.chinese: 司徒雷登在第二次国共内战期间任美国驻华大使。
